page.title: 03 @@ SCHOOL @@
page.content: You need books for English so you can learn English from. You need some books for maths so you can learn some sums from.You need books for art so you can copy from. You need books for science. You need books for reading out of.You need books for singing and to see the words.You need apparatus for art to draw with. You need apparatus for science so you can do experiments with. You need apparatus for maths _ weighing scales,weights, compasses,rulers,scissors, protractors centicubes,computers.You need apparatus for P.E.to climb on and stuff like footballs,netballs ,goal posts, rounder bats ,cones, cricket bats, goalnets. You learn things at school like English,maths and science, music and singing.You learn to keep the school tidy and obey rules.
